flawed_nl_solution:
The left-hand mice cost 120*0.3=$<<120*0.3=36.0>>36.0 more than right-handed ones
So they cost 120+36.0=$<<120+36.0=156.0>>156.0
So he makes 156.0*25=$<<156.0*25=3900.0>>3900.0 a day
The store is open 7-3=<<7-3=7>>7 days a week
So in a week, he makes 3900.0*7=$<<3900.0*7=27300.0>>27300.0

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 4, not 7. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
